title: centrally managed
extract: Managers of centrally managed items concentrate on controlling the authorization and accountability of items that support the warfighter, which limits the number of centrally managed items available to nondeployable table of distribution and allowances (TDA) activities, such as garrisons.
extract_html: Managers of centrally managed items concentrate on controlling the authorization and accountability of items that support the warfighter, which limits the number of centrally managed items available to nondeployable table of distribution and allowances (TDA) activities, such as garrisons.
